sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A modest reply humbly offer'd, as an answer to, and confutation of seven arguments collected and deliver'd by Mr. Samuel Lawrence, in a sermon preach'd at his meeting-house in Namptwich, Octob. 16th, 1691, whereby he would shew, that the infants of professing Christians ought to be baptized : with a seasonable word to my brethren of the baptized church / presented by the most unworthiest of her servants, S.A. Acton, Samuel, d. 1740? Lawrence, Samuel.
[7], 40 p.
Printed for the author ..., London : 1692.
Reproduction of original in: Dr. Williams' Library, London, England.
=======

Acton, Samuel, d. 1740? Lawrence, Samuel.
[7], 40 p.
